name: Electric Train Set for Kids with Remote Control, Classic Steam Locomotive with Smoke, Lights & Sounds, Kids Retro Trains Tracks Toys for Christmas

Add a few drops of water, activate the smoke effect from the chimney, and watch soft fog swirl around – all synchronized with motion and sound for realistic play that dazzles at night and grabs attention in photos (Fully charge the battery before first use)

Kids can steer the locomotive easily, enhancing engagement and sense of accomplishment. Also designed for easy use: large buttons, simple controls, and safe range of operation mean even younger children (ages 3-8) can join in

Multiple Track Play: Everything you need to start chugging immediately is included: multiple track pieces (curved, straight, maybe Y-junctions) ready to assemble into oval, figure-8 or custom layouts. Tracks interlock snugly to prevent gaps, stay stable in play, and allow playful creativity. Whether around Christmas tree display or floor model, flexibility in layout means it fits various spaces and themes

Perfect Holiday Gift: Beautifully packaged and rich in detail, this electric train set is more than a toy—it’s a magical holiday surprise. Ideal for Christmas mornings, birthdays, or festive décor, it delights kids and creates warm family memories year after year

name: Lionel The Polar Express Electric O Gauge Bluetooth 5.0 Model Train Set with Remote
short_description: GAUGE DETAILS: Lionel O Gauge Systems are approximately 1:48 in scale and are what people envision when the think Lionel. Our 3-Rail FasTrack systems measure 1.25" between the outer rails, and any O Gauge product can operate on it if the curve track used can accommodate the cars.
product_description: Immerse yourself in an iconic world of The Polar Express with the Lionel Polar Express Electric O Gauge Bluetooth 5.0 Model Train Set with Remote. This set has been upgraded with Bluetooth 5.0 technology that allows you to operate your train using voice control and gives you the option to record and live stream your own custom announcements. Set includes (1) 2-8-4 Locomotive, (1) Tender, (2) Coach Cars, (1) Observation Car, (4) Articulated Movie Character Figures, (8) Curved O36 FasTrack sections, (1) FasTrack Terminal section, (1) Straight Ten Inch FasTrack Plug-Expand-Play Power Lock on section, (2) Straight Ten Inch FasTrack sections, (1) Wall Pack Power supply, (1) LionChief Remote for Locomotive, and (1) Polar Express Bell. Operation Technology via the Lionel LionChief App includes Bluetooth - Operates your train via any compatible smart device. Lionel Voice Control (LVC) - Runs your locomotive by speaking commands into a smart device. Voice Streaming & Recording (VSR) - Records your own voice to generate custom train announcements, or stream voice live through engine. RailSounds System controls steam chuffing, background sounds, whistle, bell, and user activated announcements. FasTrack System features snap together locking mechanism for tight, reliable connections. Features an electric locomotive controlled by remote, a powerful maintenance-free motor, diecast metal locomotive body, On/Off switch for smoke & sounds, puffing smoke, operating couplers, steam chuffing and background sounds, whistle, bell, user-activated announcements, operating headlight, two traction tires, silhouettes in windows, and interior lighting. Remote control requires (3) AAA Alkaline Batteries for operation (not included). Phillip screwdriver required (not included). Lubricate wheels, axles, & linkage regularly. Wipe with a soft cloth occasionally to clean. Remove all batteries when not in use for an extended period of time. Recommended for ages 14 years and up.
product_details: Manufacturer recommended age 14 years and up
